node.display_long_description: Hello, Island Spirit!  A group of adorable sailors have been marooned on your shore.  Let’s help them build a home here. And just maybe, they can help us repair the island’s broken heart.  Explore the eight beautiful and distinct climates of the island, and with fishing, cooking, farming, mining, painting, themed decorations, and many hours of story quests, you won’t run out of things to do.  You can invite a friend if you wish, just make sure to watch out for the Raccoons!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
V:235238
Large save games load correctly on the Quest.
    •There had been occasions where some players with larger (15-25mb) save files would crash when trying to load those saves on Quest. The saves would often be corrupted when this crash happened.
    •We adjusted the code so those larger sizes will load correctly.
    •PLEASE NOTE: Larger save files will continue to take longer to load than smaller save files.

Under-the-hood adjustments to when islands can be joined in Multiplayer. 
    •There were a few cases where an island would show as “available to join” before it has completely loaded save data. Trying to connect to an island in that state would cause disconnection or a crash.
    •Now, islands only show up as “available to join” once all data has been completely loaded.

node.reviewDescription:
I loaded in really excited to check it out and say hi to other people on their islands but it’s super super uncreative. There’s a lot of flaws with the mechanics and unlockables. For example:
I booted up the game and only had the city center unlocked and nothing else. Normal right? I have to unlock the rest of the island to get the mine and farm n stuff. 

Why does it make sense that i can load into someone’s island with everything unlocked and use their tools to get supplies from the work they did

I literally have every fruit, and items i need and all i unlocked was just the farm. (Shout out to that random kid blade113 for just loaning me his entire island to just mine supplies for an hour)

Also: No creativity is involved
No island is different from the other
I don’t understand why you would be exited to go to someone’s island if it’s literally the same

And NO ITEMS DESPAWN
AUUUGGGHH
I mine a tree, grab three wood
The rest of the tree is forever there
I create a chunk glitch with so much poop but next time i log in it’s still there! It literally is covering my island and if i throw it into the water it teleports back.

WHAT??!! How am I supposed to get rid of this stack of literally useless item if I cant give it to people of discard it?? 

Long story short
Random people like me can talk to your children and there’s no muting, they can hear you whenever they join

The game mechanics are really terrible

And after literally my one hour of gameplay I clipped through floors and dropped all my islanders into a void, put a cat into and endless loop of falling by placing a hill to the water where he spawns in, and covered my island in literal poop with no way to dispose of it

So if you like poop and cursing 5 year olds
Get this game
I highly doubt these will get fixed even though they are really simple fixer uppers because this game was 11$
node.reviewTitle: A tech teen writes a review
